title: When Jesus Goes To Berkeley College With Sean McDowell | Unapologetic 89
itunes:title: When Jesus Goes To Berkeley College With Sean McDowell | Unapologetic 89
description: One of the most liberal places in the US, both politically and theological, is Berkeley College in Berkeley, CA. We are going to hear about what happens when you share the Gospel with people on the campus.
